H0.text: Meter stick and test tubes can be used to measure the density of a material.

H1.text: Beaker and stopwatch are used to measure the density of a material.

H2.text: Thermometer and computer probes are used to measure the density of a material.

H3.text: A balance and graduated cylinder are used to measure the density of a material.

A4.text: The mass is normally measured with a scale or balance; the volume may be measured directly (from the geometry of the object) or by the displacement of a fluid.
